title: Endpoint Security Agent: A Comprehensive Approach to Real-time System Monitoring and Threat Detection
summary: As cyber threats continue to evolve in complexity and frequency, robust endpoint protection is essential for organizational security. This paper presents "Endpoint Security Agent: A Comprehensive Approach to Real-time System Monitoring and Threat Detection" a modular, real-time security solution for Windows endpoints.
